evidence.text: NOTICE OF APPEAL TO DC CIRCUIT COURT by SCOTT BESSENT, SERGIO GOR, KAREN GORMAN, KARL KAMMANN, DONALD J. TRUMP, RUSSELL VOUGHT.

evidence.source_document: Appellee's Motion to Dismiss as Moot
evidence.text: On March 3, 2025, defendants-appellants filed a notice of appeal in this Court seeking review of an order issued by the District Court of the District of Columbia: Dellinger v. Bessent, No. 25 Civ. 385 (D.D.C. March 1, 2025).

extracted.value: Appeal: SCOTT BESSENT, SERGIO GOR, KAREN GORMAN, KARL KAMMANN, DONALD J. TRUMP, RUSSELL VOUGHT appealed to DC Circuit Court.
